docs.lead_paragraph: If this tragedy prompts reflection and debate, as it should, let's make sure it's worthy of those we have lost. PRESIDENT OBAMA, speaking at a memorial service for the victims of the Tucson shooting rampage. [A1]

docs.lead_paragraph: Just saying no to everything may be good short-term politics, but it's not leadership. We were sent here to serve our citizens, not our ambitions. PRESIDENT OBAMA.

docs.lead_paragraph: Bankers don't need another vote in the United States Senate. They've got plenty. PRESIDENT OBAMA, at a campaign rally in Massachusetts for Martha Coakley, who is running for the Senate against a conservative Republican, Scott Brown. [A13]

docs.lead_paragraph: I will not spend a single penny for the purpose of rewarding a single Wall Street executive, but I will do whatever it takes to help the small business that can't pay its workers or the family that has saved and still can't get a mortgage. PRESIDENT OBAMA, addressing a joint session of Congress on Tuesday night. [A16]

docs.lead_paragraph: You look out at the landscape, and there have to be moments when you just say, where to begin? How to start? But there's no doubt in my mind what the people of this community can do. There's no doubt in my mind that Joplin will rebuild. PRESIDENT OBAMA [A13]
